question: A New Deoband fatwa website http://shariahboard.com/ has issued fatwa about digital camera which is quite confusing. please do guide me and is Mufti Nawal ur Rehman authentic Alim?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The Fatwa that we viewed on the www.shariahboard.com website clearly states that usage of a digital camera is not permissible. We concur with this ruling.

While we do not know Mufti Nawal Saheb personally, the biography given on the website shows him to be a very senior, high ranking Mufti, who studied under great luminaries and benefited from their company.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
